questions.question_text: What is the formula for Forecasted Utilization?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Forecasted Utilization
Percentage of forecasted resource time utilization. It is calculated as sum of allocated and confirmed hours, divided by the total capacity.

Selected Answer: B
Forecasted Utilization
Percentage of forecasted resource time utilization. It is calculated as sum of allocated and confirmed hours, divided by the total capacity.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-business-management/page/product/resource-management/concept/c_UsingResourceManagementReports.html

Forecasted Utilization: Percentage of forecasted resource time utilization. It is calculated as sum of allocated and confirmed hours, divided by the total capacity.

questions.question_text: What are the allocation types available on a resource plan? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACD
Wrong initial answer again! Checked in PDI.

Selected Answer: ACD

Allocation type: The value in this field determines how the planned hours are distributed across resource plan duration among requested resources:
- Weekly
- Monthly
- Plan Duration
